altername_name: Lupin the Third: Cagliostro no Shiro
name: Lupin the 3rd: Cagliostro no Shiro
overview: A video game adaption of Hayao Miyazaki's Lupin III anime film of the same name. A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid cop struggle to free a princess from an evil count, and learn the secret of a treasure that she holds part of the key to.
